page.title: 14ROADS AROUND HERRINGTHORPE
page.content: Wickersley road is one of the oldest roads in Rotherham,but one year all the trees caught Dutch Elm disease,and all the trees had to be cut down.wickersley road starts at the Brecks and carrys on down till it changes to Wellgate,and carrys on through town. East Bawtry road starts right out at Maltby and goes right down past Whiston traffic lights and carrys on to M.F.I,Furnishing World and Wickes.Bawtry road is partly a dual carriage way.If you go further up the road there is a secondary school.There is a foot bridge for the children to cross the road but not many of them use it because it is not very good because it takes to long to climb up the steps and down again.
